title: Answer pls
body:
The acc who is boosted, can he get pergament ban???
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body: [**Boosting another player is against our terms of use**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751834) and is something that can be punishable. Duoing with someone isn't necessarily boosting, but having someone play your account for you isn't okay.
noone play on my acc, i just ask bcs i boost my friend
